page.title: 11THE NEW BY-PASS - 1985
page.content: A lot of local quarries were used to construct the motorway that by-passes Accrington. It starts at {Burnley Road} and finishes near { {Haslingden.}On May 17th 1985 there was {a Fun Run} along the motorway when there was no traffic of course. The distance was about seven miles and I finished in about forty minutes. I also came in amongst the first fifty and there were adults running including my elder brother. I beat him too. Altogether there were about 7OO running in the race. They played the theme music from a film of the Olympic Games called{"Chariots of {Fire"}at the beginning of the race. I entered another race{up the Coppice} and across to the Motorway and was sponsored. This meant that I raised Â£3O for the{Famine in Ethiopia.} Christopher Helm.
